question: spyder from once upon a time in venice
chain_of_thought_result: In "Once Upon a Time in Venice," Spyder is a character played by actor Jason Momoa. He is depicted as a tough and intimidating figure, serving as a drug dealer and a significant antagonist in the film. The story revolves around a private detective named Steve Ford, portrayed by Bruce Willis, who gets entangled in a series of events involving Spyder when he tries to retrieve his stolen dog. Spyder's character adds tension and conflict to the plot, showcasing the darker side of the Los Angeles underworld.
